interfaces.name: Action
ButtonBarAction
Column
EntityLoader
GridAction
Page
PageSelection
PagingParams
SortDefinition

injectables.name: EntityLoaderBase
RouteStateEntityLoader

classes.name: CrudDataProvider

components.name: FilterContainerComponent
PagedListComponent

inputsClass.name: buttonBarActions
inputsClass.description: Actions to show on top of the grid, in the action bar.

inputsClass.name: entityPluralName
inputsClass.description: The pluralized name of the entity, shown in the pager.

inputsClass.name: gridActions
inputsClass.description: Actions to show inside the grid, with a dropdown on each line.

inputsClass.name: loading
inputsClass.description: Indicates is the data is loading or refreshing.

inputsClass.name: pageSize
inputsClass.description: The number of records in this page.

inputsClass.name: pageSizeOptions
inputsClass.description: Page size options the user can choose from.

inputsClass.name: total
inputsClass.description: Total amount of records. In case of server side paging, this is the amount of records on the server matching the filters.

outputsClass.name: update
outputsClass.description: An update occured to the grid configuration.

components.templateData: {{ column.title }} {{propertyValue(column, record)}} {{propertyValue(column, record)}} {{propertyValue(column, record)}} {{propertyValue(column, record) | json}} {{ label }} {{ formatObject(column, label) }} {{propertyValue(column, record) | date}} {{ action.gridLabel(record) }} {{entityPluralName}} per page {{pagination.firstItem + 1}} - {{pagination.lastItem + 1}} of {{pagination.totalItems}} {{entityPluralName}}

components.name: SectionTitleComponent
components.templateData: {{ title }}
